== Fish + Bash ==

## Emacs bindings

- Ctrl + A = Go to beggining of line
- Ctrl + E = Go to end of line
- Alt + F = Go to next word
- Alt + B = Go to previous word
- Alt + D = Delete word on right of cursor
- Ctrl + W = Delete word on left of cursor
- Alt + U = Capitalize word
- Alt + L = Uncapitalize word
- Alt + C = Capitalize character under cursor
- Ctrl + Y = Paste from clipboard
- Ctrl + U = Cut everything before the cursor
- Ctrl + K = Cut everything after the cursor
- Ctrl + L = Clear screen
- Alt + . = Get last parameter and put in the end of cursor
